title: "Our login yordles got bored waiting for you to enter your username and password and wandered off"
body:
This message appeared everytime I tried to login (I tried multiple accounts).
So I decided to restart my PC and now it works, my question is:
What caused it? Did I do something wrong? And how do avoid this problem in the future?

replies.body: Hmmmmm it might have been something blocking your network like a certain firewall setting or something. If it happens again, don't hesitate to hit us back up or check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a few tips.
